Articles.Content:
I'm Althalus, and I like things.

I've been playing KSP and watching the forums on and off for a couple of years, but I finally decided to join the discussion.

I'm based in Ireland, love Drama and good Animes/TV Shows. I work for a server hosting company, and I'm studying Computer science.

Hi

Welcome to the forums!

Heh, everyone likes good tv shows.
Hi, welcome! The forum here is great, so enjoy yourself. By any chance, have you seen Soul Eater?
